name: Georg Tavonius
bio: I am a professional freelance developer who mainly writes JavaScript and Ruby. And that almost every day. But I don't stop there. Currently I am also training myself in Rust & Go thanks to exercism.io.

name: Cameron MacDonald
bio: I write JS professionally, and I also write JSX in Reactjs, so I've got plenty of experience with this and I'm happy to show you the ropes!

name: Dante Federici
bio: Climbing coder. Working with JS professionally for both web and desktop applications for 8+ years.

name: Chris Strolia-Davis
bio: I've been developing with JavaScript/EcmaScript for about 2 decades. I've been helped by many and I'm happy to help others.

name: Colton Ehrman
bio: I love to keep things simple, and slowly work on new projects little by little. It makes the most complex problems not so complex after all.

name: Jared Mortenson
bio: I love learning to the point I got degrees in how/why people think the way they do and how to teach them. Then I learned how to program and have been trying to teach others as often as I can. Hope I can help.

name: Celestine Ekoh-Ordan
bio: I am a full stack software developer with experience primarily in the JavaScript stack.

name: Semyon Pisarev
bio: I enjoy mentoring developers. Have years of hands-on experience in Code Reviews, Architecture, Ruby, JavaScript.

name: Frederic Meyer
bio: French developper for more than 20 years in Management Systems, i was insterested in several languages and technologies like Java, PHP, and other in Web enviroment. But JS is inescapable with NodeJS and frontend frameworks, i like it too.

name: Adam Green
bio: I've been programming for 9 years and in my current job purely in Javascript. I've worked on mostly node.js and react with functional programming being my preferred style.

name: Constantine Akritides
bio: I am a Makers Academy student in London and a Junior Software Engineer, currently coding in Javascript, Ruby, and C#. I am willing to help and mentor my fellow devs and I usually follow a TDD/BDD approach.

name: Aleksey Chistyakov
bio: I've been programming for 4 years and in my current job purely in Javascript.
